ClassDesc: along with https:##developer#android#com@B_android#support#wearable#view#ActionPage_E@ ActionLabel is a specialized text display widget. An upper and lower bound for text size and a maximum number of lines are provided and the layout is adjusted automatically to find the largest possible text size satisfying those constraints. In order to provide a fixed bound, an ActionLabel should always be used with a width and height of "match_parent" or a specific size.
